title: Drawing, "Sideboard", ca. 1929–30
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; lower right in graphite: SCALE: 1"=1'0"/7705 [circled]; dimensions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for small sideboard. Rectilinear shape with two square drawers and ring pulls; drawers and side panel in different wood than body of sideboard.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", ca. 1929–30.
ca. 1929–30. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-925.
